DOC.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability Single Dose BI 44370 Tablet During Between Migraine Attacks
DOC.criteria: Adult male female migraine patient ( age 18 65 year ) without aura , diagnose accord IHS criterion . Established migraine diagnosis > = 1 year . Age migraine onset < = 50 year . Well document ( > = 3 month ) retrospective history migraine headache moderate severe intensity attack duration least 6 hour migraine frequency 28 time / month Other form headache permitted average occur 10 day / month patient able differentiate migraine headache form headache . Patient provide write informed consent accordance ICHGCP local legislation . Patient general good health base om screen assessment Women childbearing potential without adequate method contraception Any woman childbearing potential negative serum pregnancy test screen negative urine pregnancy test baseline Breastfeeding woman Males willing use adequate contraception ( condom use plus another form contraception e.g . spermicide , oral contraceptive take female partner , sterilization , IUD [ intrauterine device ] ) whole study period time first intake study drug three month last intake . History hemiplegic , ophthalmoplegic , basilar migraine cluster headache . History treatment resistant migraine attack , define lack response range commonly use acute antimigraine compound . History , clinical evidence , screening/baseline finding suggestive significant medical disorder ( e.g . cardiovascular , peripheral vascular , hepatic , respiratory , haematological , renal , gastrointestinal , immunological , metabolic , hormonal , neurological psychiatric disorder ) Smokers ...
